list.name: Default
list.comment: Change the way collision between players work to fix some bugs.

task.summary: Window resizing in function of the monitor, image resizing to use 15*15 square game room, main game loop and loading of level from .txt files.
Basic collision (Need to do the collision check on bomb planting)
Remove useless free space in player images.
Collision detection when planting bomb so the player can't plant on wall;
First working version of the game(Replay after a game do not work atm)

Add some levels with kind of different pattern. The levels are chosen randomly when the game start in the list of levels. I read the number of files in the Levels directory so users can freely add their own levels as they wish. I'll add a level selection box with the choice between level X or Random.
Fill the javadoc for everything done so far.

Modify the bomb planting to plant it below the player, as in the classic Bomberman. Remove the KeyListener from the PlayGround class. Modify the player 2 images. Make use of the Key enum as key mapping. + some minor changes.

Add a timer between the planting of two bomb to avoid unwanted planting if we keep the plant key for too long. Remove a bug causing PowerUp to be destroyed even if the explosion do not collide with it.
Add an "other" key enum to avoid error when pressing a non supported key. Augment players speed.
Explosion stop spreading after encountering a wall. ( no more entire row of wall destroyed at once )

MESSAGE.value: Update Playground frame to test resizing & some things.
Window resizing in function of the monitor, image resizing to use 15*15 square game room, main game loop and loading of level from .txt files.
Basic collision (Need to do the collision check on bomb planting)
Remove useless free space in player images.
Collision detection when planting bomb so the player can't plant on wall;
First working version of the game(Replay after a game do not work atm)

Add some levels with kind of different pattern. The levels are chosen randomly when the game start in the list of levels. I read the number of files in the Levels directory so users can freely add their own levels as they wish. I'll add a level selection box with the choice between level X or Random.
Fill the javadoc for everything done so far.

Modify the bomb planting to plant it below the player, as in the classic Bomberman. Remove the KeyListener from the PlayGround class. Modify the player 2 images. Make use of the Key enum as key mapping. + some minor changes.

Add a timer between the planting of two bomb to avoid unwanted planting if we keep the plant key for too long. Remove a bug causing PowerUp to be destroyed even if the explosion do not collide with it.
Add an "other" key enum to avoid error when pressing a non supported key. Augment players speed.
Explosion stop spreading after encountering a wall. ( no more entire row of wall destroyed at once )
Change the way collision between players work to fix some bugs.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Change the way collision between players work to fix some bugs.
